blog about

pola schwöbel




I am a PhD student at the Technical University of Denmark, Department of Applied Mathematics and Computer Science where I am part of the Section for Cognitive Systems. My work centers around Machine Learning, Computer Vision and Algorithmic Fairness.



  • new paper

    July 10, 2020 — 11:26

    Our work on "Probabilistic Spatial Transformers for Bayesian Data Augmentation" is out on arxiv.


  • talk at AI expo

    October 20, 2019 — 14:11

    I gave a talk at DTU's Skylab - "Bias in - Bias out? Building Fair Models from Imbalanced Data."


  • summer school organization

    September 6, 2019 — 18:11

    I hosted a summer school on fairness and machine learning.
